entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Once again your daring and skill show through. You gained access to the high security area of the Valarian Depot, identified EV-9D9's cargo, reprogrammed a lifter to load it onto a shuttle, took the access codes from the pilot and stole the shuttle. All in a day's work.
entries.journal_entry_description: EV-9D9 has had her shipment of droid disciplinary devices stolen by the Valarians. She wants to steal them back. You need to break into the high security area of the Valarian depot, find EV-9D9's cargo, reprogram a lifter to move it to a shuttle using the override chip EV-9D9 has given you. Next,  access codes from the head shuttle pilot and then reprogram the cargo shuttle to fly the cargo back to Wayfar.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Shock rods received. Next task...Valarians stole equipment... recover it. Details uploaded.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The Valarian depot has a high security area. EV-9D9 wants you to proceed there.
entries.task03_comm_message_text: Locate my cargo in one of the containers. Once located encode an override chip.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Locate EV-9D9's cargo in the high security area.
entries.task05_comm_message_text: Cargo located. Give the lifter the chip in your inventory and it will load my cargo into a shuttle.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: You identified EV-9D9's cargo container. Now have the lifter load it onto the shuttle by dragging and dropping the override chip that is in your inventory onto the lifter.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Now that you have identified the cargo container that contains EV-9D9's cargo, you must reprogram the binary lifter to take the cargo to the shuttle. Do this by dragging and dropping the override chip in your backpack onto the the load lifter.
entries.task07_journal_entry_title: Drag and Drop the Override Chip onto the Load Lifter
entries.task08_comm_message_text: Lifter reprogramed. Next gain access codes to automated shuttle from head pilot. Terminate if necessary.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: To reprogram the drone shuttle, you need the access codes. Get them from the head shuttle pilot.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: The cargo has been located and loaded up. The pilot has been eliminated and the access codes recovered. Reprogram the automated cargo ship with its new destination, Wayfar.
entries.task12_comm_message_text: Shuttle arrived at Wayfar. Return for next assignment.
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: You have stolen back EV-9D9's equipment. She wants you to return for further instructions.
